name: Let's Play: The Shining
description:
Let’s Play: The Shining is based on Stanley Kubrick’s movie The Shining, which was in turn based on Stephen King’s book The Shining. It was written in Haxe using the HaxeFlixel library. The music and sound effects in Let’s Play: The Shining were made with a combination of bxfr, Bosca Ceoil, and Audacity. The graphics were made in Pixen.

You can read my writing about Let’s Play: The Shining on my blog or even read the Let’s Play: The Shining press kit. Let’s Play: The Shining was covered on Kill Screen, A. V. Club, Madmoizelle, Warp Door, FREEINDIEGA.ME, iHorror.com, Forest Ambassador, Games Radar, International Business Times, and Madmoizelle. It has also been exhibited at GAMERZ 2015.
